programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Comedy action adventure starring Ben Stiller, Robert Downey Jr and Jack Black. programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Second World War drama starring Asa Butterfield, Jack Scanlon and David Thewlis. After his Nazi officer father is given a promotion, young Bruno and his family are moved from Berlin to a remote house in the countryside. With nothing to do and no friends of his own age, Bruno becomes curious about a nearby building known as "the farm" and its oddly clothed inhabitants Mark Herman - Director Asa Butterfield - Bruno Jack Scanlon - Shmuel Amber Beattie - Gretel David Thewlis - Bruno's father Vera Farmiga - Elsa, Bruno's mother Richard Johnson - Grandpa Sheila Hancock - Grandma Rupert Friend - Lt Kotler David Hayman - Pavel Jim Norton - Herr Liszt Asa Butterfield - Bruno Jack Scanlon - Shmuel Amber Beattie - Gretel David Thewlis - Bruno's father Vera Farmiga - Elsa, Bruno's mother Richard Johnson - Grandpa Sheila Hancock - Grandma Rupert Friend - Lt Kotler David Hayman - Pavel Jim Norton - Herr Liszt.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell

programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller based on the popular ital}anime and manga series, starring Scarlett Johansson. programme.title: The Boat That Rocked
programme.desc: Period comedy written and directed by Richard Curtis, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bill Nighy and Rhys Ifans. At the height of the Swinging Sixties, the pirate DJs of Radio Rock take to the high seas to play rock and pop music in defiance of the British government. programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.sub-title: Action, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Family, Drama ║ 2011 ║ U
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Comedy adventure starring Rowan Atkinson, and featuring John Malkovich. When the crown jewels are stolen from under the nose of the authorities, bumbling secret agent Johnny English is assigned to retrieve them and capture the culprits. programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Sci Fi, Romance, Drama ║ 2002 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst. During a school trip to a New York laboratory, Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider and develops extraordinary powers. Then a series of events convinces Peter that he should use his new physical abilities to wage war on crime - a decision that takes him away from his school sweetheart, Mary Jane Watson, and pits him against the evil Green Goblin. n Sam Raimi - Director Tobey Maguire - Peter Parker / Spider-Man Willem Dafoe - Green Goblin / Norman Osborn Kirsten Dunst - Mary Jane Watson James Franco - Harry Osborn Cliff Robertson - Ben Parker Rosemary Harris - May Parker J K Simmons - J Jonah Jameson Gerry Becker - Maximilian Fargas Bill Nunn - Joseph \Robbie\ Robertson Jack Betts - Henry Balkan Stanley Anderson - General Slocum Ron Perkins - Dr Mendel Stromm Joe Manganiello - Eugene \Flash\ Thompson Ted Raimi - Hoffman Bruce Campbell - Ring announcer Macy Gray - Macy Gray Lucy Lawless - Punk rock girl Michael Papajohn - The Burglar Randy Poffo - Bone Saw McGraw Stan Lee - Man shielding child Tobey Maguire - Peter Parker / Spider-Man Willem Dafoe - Green Goblin / Norman Osborn Kirsten Dunst - Mary Jane Watson James Franco - Harry Osborn Cliff Robertson - Ben Parker Rosemary Harris - May Parker J K Simmons - J Jonah Jameson Gerry Becker - Maximilian Fargas Bill Nunn - Joseph \Robbie\ Robertson Jack Betts - Henry Balkan Stanley Anderson - General Slocum Ron Perkins - Dr Mendel Stromm Joe Manganiello - Eugene \Flash\ Thompson Ted Raimi - Hoffman Bruce Campbell - Ring announcer Macy Gray - Macy Gray Lucy Lawless - Punk rock girl Michael Papajohn - The Burglar Randy Poffo - Bone Saw McGraw Stan Lee - Man shielding child.

programme.title: Sin City
programme.desc: Adaptation of Frank Miller's hard-boiled comic book, starring Bruce Willis, Clive Owen and Mickey Rourke. In the ultra-violent metropolis of Basin City, cops, criminals and femmes fatales collide in love, lust or gory conflict. Honest cop Hartigan tries to protect a dancer from a sadistic killer, while ex-con Marv wants revenge for the murder of his sweetheart. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.sub-title: Action, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Family, Drama ║ 2008 ║ PG
programme.desc: Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman and Angelina Jolie. Ancient China: Po the Panda lives in the Valley of Peace and dreams of becoming a kung fu master despite the fact he is clumsy, overweight and a complete beginner at martial arts. So when he's accidentally chosen to be the legendary Dragon Warrior, he is overjoyed. programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. programme.title: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale
programme.desc: When Jerry visits an empty opera house, he makes a wish for the chance to perform. His dream comes true, and he is transported to a magical kingdom where he dances with a musical box ballerina. However, a group of alley cats, led by the mischievous Tom, wreaks havoc on the enchanted world and steals the ballerina. Jerry, accompanied by a fellow rodent named Tuffy and his friends, sets out on a mission to put things right. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. programme.desc: (1971) Drama starring Rajesh Khanna, Mumtaz, Meena Kumari and K. N. Singh. Directed by Dulal Guha. Produced by Premji. Music by Laxmikant Pyarelal.

programme.title: Khatarnak
programme.desc: (1990) Suraj (Sanjay Dutt), a cold blooded killer, decides to give up crime for the sake of love. However, some people won't let him have his way so easily.

programme.title: Abhinetri
programme.desc: A chance meeting between an Assistant Scientist, Shekar, and an established stage dancer and singer, Anjana, results in love. Stars Shashi Kapoor, Hema Malini. 1970.

programme.title: Main Prem Ki Diwani Hoon

programme.title: Kotigobba - 3
programme.desc: After succeeding at framing ACP Kishore, Satya goes on to become an international criminal. While he gets targeted by Interpol, Kishore seeks revenge on him too, after prison release.

programme.title: Sanam Teri Kasam
programme.desc: When Saraswati's father throws her out of the house, Inder stands with her against all odds and this brings them close to each other. However, destiny has its own plans.

programme.title: Pyar Jhukta Nahin
programme.desc: (1985) Drama starring Mithun Chakraborty, Padmini Kolhapure, Danny Denzogpa, Bindu and Master Vicky. Directed by Vijay Sadanah. Produced by K.C. Bokadia. Music by Laxmikant Pyarelal.

programme.title: Shirdi Ke Sai Baba

programme.title: Jheel Ke Us Paar
programme.desc: Jal Mistry won an award for 'Best Cinematography' at the Filmfare Awards 1974.

programme.title: Prem
